title: Scientists race to study variants in India as cases explode
content:
1. Scientists race to study variants in India as cases explode  The Associated Press
  2. Triple-mutant Covid variant from India is now a potential global health risk  CNBC Television
  3. Kids as young as 12 will soon get the Covid-19 shot in America. Elsewhere, entire populations are still waiting  CNN
  4. The Real Covid Variant Risk From India's Pandemic Wave Is Being Missed  Bloomberg
  5. Help India with its Covid-19 catastrophe  Bangkok Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
